## Interactive Gene Table

```{r}

library(shiny)

library(DT)

# Example: your gene data

# Load your data from RDS
genes <- readRDS("DEgenes.rds")

# Show the interactive table
datatable(genes, options = list(pageLength = 10, searchHighlight = TRUE))
```
